attributes.action: Allow citizens to vote to go to war
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think it is about time that we have the right to vote whether we want to go to war as citizens of Britain. 

It is those certain individuals that are our citizens that would fight a war, it will be also the very families that members of them that will be sent to war.

We should also close over sea bases and withdraw from anywhere around the world, where we have no threats and bring back our forces to protect this island. 

Bring back the troops!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
